text: This is a list of castles in Ukraine. Akkerman Fortress in Bilhorod- Dnistrovskyi Genoese fortress in Sudak The Kamianets-Podilskyi Castle Khotyn Fortress The Olesko Castle The Palanok Castle in Mukacheve The Pidhirtsi Castle The Svirzh Castle The Swallow's Nest castle near Yalta Yeni-Kale Fortress in Kerch. The Zolochiv Castle The Lutsk Castle ==A== * Akkerman Fortress in Bilhorod-Dnistrovskyi, Odessa Oblast ==B== * Bar Castle in Bar, Vinnytsia Oblast * Berdychiv Castle in Berdychiv, Zhytomyr Oblast * Berezhany Castle in Berezhany, Ternopil Oblastcastles.org - Berezhany Castle * Brody Castle in Brody, Lviv Oblast * The ruined Bronka Castle in Bronka, Zakarpattia Oblast * Buchach Castle in Buchach, Ternopil Oblast ==C== * The ruined Chervonohorod Castle in Nyrkiv, Ternopil Oblast * Chembalo fortress in Balaklava, Crimea * The ruined Chernelytsia Castle in Chernelytsia, Ivano- Frankivsk Oblast * Chufut Kale fortress near Bakhchisaray, Crimea ==D== * Dobromyl Castle in Dobromyl, Lviv Oblast * Dubno Castle in Dubno, Rivne OblastLiveJournal.com - Dubno Castle, 1492 ==G== * The Genoese fortress in Sudak, Crimea ==H== * Halych Castle in Halych, Ivano-Frankivsk Oblastcastles.org — Halych Castle ==I== * Ivano-Frankivsk Castle in Ivano- Frankivsk, Ivano-Frankivsk Oblastcastles.org — Ivano-Frankivsk Castle * Iziaslav Castle in northern Khmelnytskyi Oblastcastles.org — Iziaslav Castle ==K== * Kamianets-Podilskyi Castle in Kamianets-Podilskyi, Khmelnytsky Oblast"The old fortress on the Smotrich River," in Zerkalo Nedeli (Weekly Mirror), June 28 - July 5, 2002, available online in Ukrainian and in Russian * The ruined Genoese Kaffa fortress in Feodosiya, Crimea * Khotyn Fortress in Khotyn, Chernivtsi Oblast * The ruins of Khust Castle in Khust, Zakarpattia Oblast * Kilia Castle in Kilia, Odessa Oblast * Kremenets Castle in Kremenets, Ternopil Oblast * Kodak fortress in Dnipro, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast * Kudryntsi Castle in Kudryntsi, Ternopil Oblast * Kyiv Fortress in Kyiv, Kyiv Oblast ==L== * Letychiv Castle in Letychiv, Khmelnytskyi Oblastcastles.org — Letychiv Castle * Lviv High Castle in Lviv, Lviv Oblast * Lutsk Castle in Lutsk, Volyn Oblastcastles.org — Lutsk Castle ==M== * Medzhybizh Castle in Medzhybizhcastles.org — Medzhybizh Castle * Mangup, its ruins are near Sevastopol * Mykulyntsi Castle in Mykulyntsi, Ternopil Oblast ==N== * Nevytsky Castle in Nevytske, Zakarpattia Oblast * Nizhyn Castle in Nizhyn, Chernihiv Oblast ==O== * Olesko Castle, title: List of castles in Ukraine
